snippet: Expect prosecutors, aided by a steady of stream of whistle-blowers, to focus on violations that involve hedge funds and foreign bribery.
abstract: Expect prosecutors, aided by a steady of stream of whistle-blowers, to focus on violations that involve hedge funds and foreign bribery.

headline.main: Federal Regulators Stay on the Full-Court Press
